name: injectbook
description: Convert EPUB books into Codex-compatible agent skills

scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.json && node scripts/copy-assets.cjs && chmod +x dist/src/cli.js
scripts.build:binary: pnpm run build && mkdir -p dist/pkg .pkg-cache && PKG_CACHE_PATH="$PWD/.pkg-cache" pkg dist/src/cli.js --targets node18-macos-arm64,node18-macos-x64 --output dist/pkg/injectbook
scripts.test:unit: pnpm run build && node --test dist/test/parser.test.js dist/test/skill-writer.test.js dist/test/path-suggestions.test.js
scripts.test:all: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:e2e
